title: on me by subsection 44GA of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves 
Agency Act 2007 (Minimum Percentage Volume of Renewable Transport Fuel 
in Petrol) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 1st day of July
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited national oil reserve agency act 2007 (minimum percentage volume renewable transport fuel petrol) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 1st day july

title: on me by subsection 44GA of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No.
on me by subsection 44GA of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No.
heading: 2. 5.5% is prescribed as the minimum percentage volume of the renewable
text_raw:
2. 5.5% is prescribed as the minimum percentage volume of the renewable 
transport fuel known as ethanol which shall be required to be included in petrol 
so that petrol may be disposed of by sale or otherwise in the State by a 
renewable transport fuel obligation account holder. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Finance consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[142] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Finance, 

31 March, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, Development Plan Delivery and Reform 
consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure, Development Plan Delivery and Reform, 

31 March, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform 

GIVEN under my Official Seal 

31 March, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [142]

title: on me by subsection 44GA of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations specify the minimum volume of ethanol to be blended with 
petrol placed on the market by sale or otherwise in the State by renewable 
transport fuel obligation account holders. The minimum percentage volume of 
ethanol is specified as 5.5%. 

[For the purpose of these Regulations, ethanol included in petrol placed on the 
market by sale or otherwise in the State must fall within the meaning of 
“renewable transport fuel” set out at section 44A of the National Oil Reserves 
Agency Act 2007.] 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [142] 5
